segments.text: You seem to be in the seventh heaven . What's put you on ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sarah and I could see eye to eye with each other .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did she give up her decision to marry Dick ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I encourage her to go her own way , but she's now having a change of heart .
segments.speaker: S2
